title: 85+ Funny Websites to Waste Time On

steps.title: Akinator
steps.content: Akinator Akinator is a prediction genie. This AI can predict what you’re thinking of. Don’t believe us? Try it out!

steps.title: Find the Invisible Cow
steps.content: Find the Invisible Cow Find the Invisible Cow is an interactive website that challenges you to find the hidden cow. Use your cursor and follow “hot and cold” clues to find the adorable cow as quickly as possible.

steps.title: Zoom Quilt
steps.content: Zoom Quilt Zoom Quilt is a website that features hypnotic colors, patterns, images, and shapes. Zoom in and out of images to calm your mind and spirit.

steps.title: Drive Me Insane
steps.content: Drive Me Insane Drive Me Insane is an interactive website that lets you drive a real-life office worker bonkers! Turn on and off lights, switch on a disco ball, or type random messages.

steps.title: The Useless Web
steps.content: The Useless Web The Useless Web is a hub for all things wacky and weird on the internet! You truly can’t get bored when using this site.

steps.title: Live Kitten Cam
steps.content: Live Kitten Cam Live Kitten Cam is a live feed of kittens! Click the link to watch kittens play whenever you’d like.

steps.title: OMFGDOGS
steps.content: OMFGDOGS OMFGDOGS is a video loop of cartoon dogs running on a rainbow. Is it a huge time-waster? Yes. Is it fun? Absolutely! Be warned: This website features flashing lights.

steps.title: Eyebleach
steps.content: Eyebleach Eyebleach fills your eyes and mind with adorable images of puppies, kittens, and babies! Visit this website whenever you need a dose of cuteness.

steps.title: Sporcle
steps.content: Sporcle Sporcle is a hub for all things quizzes! Challenge yourself and your friends to brain games and fun trivia. Looking for more fun quizzes? Check out our quiz hub !

steps.title: CookieClicker
steps.content: CookieClicker CookieClicker is just like it sounds: you click a cookie! Try to click as fast as you can to earn the most points and climb the leaderboard.

steps.title: Pottermore
steps.content: Pottermore Pottermore is the hub for all things Harry Potter! Dive into the magic with quizzes, videos, and fun facts about the Wizarding World.

steps.title: Gravity Points
steps.content: Gravity Points Gravity Points is an interactive website that lets you play with gravity. Your cursor simulates gravity, and one simple click can send everything flying.

steps.title: Hacker Typer
steps.content: Hacker Typer Hacker Typer makes you feel like you’re in The Matrix ! Type away on your keyboard to make epic-looking “code” that’s sure to make you feel like a secret agent.

steps.title: LEGO Videos
steps.content: LEGO Videos LEGO Videos is a hub for LEGO films. Watch videos based on your favorite pop culture moments or movies, like Harry Potter and Super Mario.

steps.title: Shut Up and Take My Money
steps.content: Shut Up and Take My Money Shut Up and Take My Money is a fun shopping hub for weird things. This website is full of cool gadgets and wacky items you may not find otherwise.

steps.title: Xkcd
steps.content: Xkcd Xkcd is a hub for nerdy humor. Look through posts of comic strips based on technology, science, math, and relationships.

steps.title: Scream Into the Void
steps.content: Scream Into the Void Scream Into the Void lets you get out all of your emotions. Type everything you’re feeling or struggling with into the text box. Then, send it into the void with a click and a scream.

steps.title: Habitica
steps.content: Habitica Habitica lets you design your life goals like a video game. Gamify your life with a unique avatar, quests, and challenges.

steps.title: Da Font
steps.content: Da Font Da Font is a font hub. Scroll through every type of font you could ever imagine, and try downloading a few on your computer.

steps.title: Mix
steps.content: Mix Mix is a website that helps control your search engines. With Mix, you can customize your searches and results based on your interests.

steps.title: Engrish.com
steps.content: Engrish.com Engrish.com is a website full of grammar and spelling mistakes. Cycle through the silliest errors to laugh and feel better about your own writing.
2048 2048 is a popular internet game and app that makes math fun! Move tiles strategically to get that 2048 tile.

steps.title: Wordle
steps.content: Wordle Wordle is the popular word-guessing game that is super fun to play! Simply type in a five-letter word and try to guess a new word each day. Want to beat Wordle every time? Check out our winning guide !

steps.title: Duotrigordle
steps.content: Duotrigordle Duotrigordle is Wordle on steroids. Attempt to solve 32 World puzzles at once using this fun site.

steps.title: Pokémon Showdown
steps.content: Pokémon Showdown Pokémon Showdown is a battle simulator dripping with nostalgia. Battle friends or strangers online, or play a solo adventure to pass the time.

steps.title: Poptropica
steps.content: Poptropica Poptropica is an adventure storytelling game full of mini-games and challenges. Play with friends or go on your own adventure!

steps.title: Foddy
steps.content: Foddy Foddy is a running simulation game that’s harder than it looks. Use your keyboard to control your runner’s leg muscles to reach the finish line.

steps.title: Flash By Night
steps.content: Flash By Night Flash By Night is a hub for classic flash games. Not only is this website nostalgic, but it’s a great place to pass the time!

steps.title: Space Jam
steps.content: Space Jam Space Jam is a hub for all things Space Jam! Play games and watch videos based on the classic movies.

steps.title: TagPro
steps.content: TagPro TagPro is virtual capture the flag. Play with friends or strangers and see which team comes on top!

steps.title: The Oregon Trail
steps.content: The Oregon Trail The Oregon Trail is a classic game from the 90s. See if you have what it takes to survive this historical trail or if you’ll quickly die of starvation.

steps.title: Little Alchemy 2
steps.content: Little Alchemy 2 Little Alchemy 2 is an easy but addictive game. Combine elements and create new items to level up and invent new things.

steps.title: Drench
steps.content: Drench Drench is a brain teaser game with a twist. The goal is to try to turn the board into a solid color. Do you have what it takes to beat the system?

steps.title: Quick, Draw!
steps.content: Quick, Draw! Quick, Draw! is a fun interactive Pictionary game you play with a robot. The website asks you to draw something. Then, you draw it and see if the AI can guess what it is.

steps.title: GeoGuessr
steps.content: GeoGuessr GeoGuessr puts on a random map in a random part of the world. The goal? To guess where you are based on your surroundings.

steps.title: Pointer Pointer
steps.content: Pointer Pointer Pointer Pointer is a wacky website that’s sure to make you chuckle. Simply hold your cursor in one spot on the screen, and the website will generate a photo that shows someone (or something) pointing at it.

steps.title: Oddee
steps.content: Oddee Oddee is a website full of fun facts, silly photos, and bizarre news stories. If you’re feeling bored, give this site a browse for a good laugh.

steps.title: The Onion
steps.content: The Onion The Onion is a popular satirical news site. On this website, you can find “news” stories on the most ridiculous things—things so wild they couldn’t possibly be true.

steps.title: Window Swap
steps.content: Window Swap Window Swap lets you open a virtual window in another part of the world. See what’s going on continents away with this fun website!

steps.title: Patience is a Virtue
steps.content: Patience is a Virtue Patience is a Virtue challenges your patience. This website asks you to do nothing but wait. Wait for what? We don’t know. You’ll have to see if you have what it takes to find out.

steps.title: Zombo
steps.content: Zombo Zombo is a bizarre website with a welcoming voice and…Well, we’re not really sure! The more you hang out on the site, the more you’ll likely discover.

steps.title: Cat Bounce
steps.content: Cat Bounce Cat Bounce floats adorable cats around your screen. This is a wonderful and relaxing way to pass the time and decompress.

steps.title: The Nicest Place on the Internet
steps.content: The Nicest Place on the Internet The Nicest Place on the Internet is exactly that! This website cycles through videos of people giving the screen hugs so you’ll never feel alone.

steps.title: Awkward Family Photos
steps.content: Awkward Family Photos Awkward Family Photos is a hub for the strangest group photos. From cringey poses to questionable fashion choices, these images are sure to make you laugh!

steps.title: Dog Shaming
steps.content: Dog Shaming Dog Shaming features dogs guilty of the purest crimes. This website showcases photos of dogs wearing signs that detail their “crimes.”

steps.title: Staggering Beauty
steps.content: Staggering Beauty Staggering Beauty puts you in control of the viral dancing worm! Move your cursor around and watch the worm wiggle and move across your screen to techno tunes. Be warned: This website contains flashing images and loud sounds.

steps.title: Paper Toilet
steps.content: Paper Toilet Paper Toilet is an interactive website that’s so bizarre it’s fun! All this website has is a giant roll of toilet paper. The catch? You can unroll as much of it as you want!

steps.title: Don’t Even Reply
steps.content: Don’t Even Reply Don’t Even Reply is a hub for the weirdest and wackiest emails out there. Click through a slideshow of emails that are so ridiculous they’re not worth replying to.

steps.title: Passive Aggressive Password Machine
steps.content: Passive Aggressive Password Machine Passive Aggressive Password Machine tells you just how strong your password is. Simply copy and paste passwords into this website to see if they’re just the right amount of passive-aggressive or need some work.

steps.title: Sneeze The Dragon
steps.content: Sneeze The Dragon Sneeze The Dragon is an interactive website that features a sleeping dragon. Your goal? To do whatever you can to make the dragon sneeze.

steps.title: Radio Garden
steps.content: Radio Garden Radio Garden lets you listen to radio stations from all over the world. Select an airwave and start listening!

steps.title: Radiooooo
steps.content: Radiooooo Radiooooo brings you back in time with the help of airwaves. This site is a radio archive, letting you listen to music and broadcasts from as far back as the 1900s.

steps.title: This Is Sand
steps.content: This Is Sand This Is Sand lets you recreate digital forms of the sand art you used to make as a kid! Use your cursor to make elegant, colorful designs to pass the time.

steps.title: 29a.ch
steps.content: 29a.ch 29a.ch gives you the chance to paint the cosmos! Get creative and use brilliant colors to paint the sky on this interactive site.

steps.title: Weave Silk
steps.content: Weave Silk Weave Silk lets you make beautiful works of art. Draw lines and shapes to create geometric designs that are simply mesmerizing.

steps.title: Incredibox
steps.content: Incredibox Incredibox lets you create your own music with beatboxers. Try to make a new tune, or challenge yourself to replicate your favorite beat.

steps.title: A Soft Murmur
steps.content: A Soft Murmur A Soft Murmur allows you to make a soothing melody to relax to. This website provides you with the tools to create your own ambient music.

steps.title: Taste Drive
steps.content: Taste Drive Taste Drive recommends new music based on your favorite artists. Simply tell the website what you’re currently vibing to, and it’ll give you a list of recommended songs, albums, and artists.

steps.title: You Are Listening To
steps.content: You Are Listening To You Are Listening To combines police scanner audio with lofi background music—it’s a unique (yet relaxing) experience.

steps.title: This Is Colossal
steps.content: This Is Colossal This Is Colossal is a hub for all things art. Browse a wide variety of artwork and photography to find inspiration.

steps.title: Music Theory
steps.content: Music Theory Music Theory offers free music lessons and exercises. This website is perfect for music lovers of all ages and is sure to teach you something new.

steps.title: Rainy Mood
steps.content: Rainy Mood Rainy Mood sets the mood for a rainy day. This website creates a relaxing and calming vibe whenever you need it, with rain sounds and ambiance.

steps.title: Wikipedia’s List of Individual Dogs
steps.content: Wikipedia’s List of Individual Dogs Wikipedia’s List of Individual Dogs shows the names and stories of the most famous dogs. This website is perfect for any dog lover trying to pass the time.

steps.title: List of Conspiracy Theories
steps.content: List of Conspiracy Theories List of Conspiracy Theories is exactly what it sounds like: a list of conspiracy theories! This Wikipedia page offers a long list of the most outrageous (and possibly believable) conspiracy theories out there.

steps.title: Internet Live Stats
steps.content: Internet Live Stats Internet Live Stats offers live statistics of what people are doing on the internet in real time. See how many posts have been made and what people are searching for right now!

steps.title: Instructables
steps.content: Instructables Instructables is a website full of DIY projects. In the mood to make something? Scroll through this website to get step-by-step instructions on how to make just about anything!

steps.title: ChatGPT
steps.content: ChatGPT ChatGPT is the OG AI website. This artificial intelligence can give you answers to just about anything! All you have to do is start a conversation or ask a question. Never used ChatGPT before? Check out our beginner’s guide !

steps.title: Wayback Machine
steps.content: Wayback Machine Wayback Machine takes you back in digital time. This website is an online archive of webpages that no longer exist. Simply type in a URL and date and see where your curiosity takes you.

steps.title: Stellarium
steps.content: Stellarium Stellarium puts the night sky in your hands. This website is an online planetarium, allowing you to explore the stars and learn fun things about them.

steps.title: Astronomy Picture of the Day
steps.content: Astronomy Picture of the Day Astronomy Picture of the Day gives you an amazing image of outer space every single day. Learn about what NASA is up to, all while taking in an incredible photo.

steps.title: MuscleWiki
steps.content: MuscleWiki MuscleWiki can be a super helpful tool for any gym buff. This website offers a full diagram of the body, along with tips and tricks on how to work out each muscle. Looking for workout tips? Check out our fitness articles !

steps.title: Duolingo
steps.content: Duolingo Duolingo is a popular language learning app and website. Use your free time to learn a new language by playing mini games and completing tasks.

steps.title: Lizard Point
steps.content: Lizard Point Lizard Point makes geography fun! Challenge your knowledge of the world with quizzes and games to learn something new.

steps.title: Sleepytime
steps.content: Sleepytime Sleepytime calculates your sleeping schedule, helping you find a nighttime routine that’s perfect for you. This website is ideal for those who want to use their downtime to improve their health. Need some more advice on how to fix your sleep schedule? Check out our articles on sleep health .

steps.title: Code Academy
steps.content: Code Academy Code Academy offers free coding lessons and feedback. Pick up a new trade with this fun website!

steps.title: What Should I Read Next?
steps.content: What Should I Read Next? What Should I Read Next? is a great site for book lovers. All you have to do is fill in your preferences, and this website will offer recommendations for your next read. Take our “What Book Should I Read?” quiz for even more recommendations!

steps.title: My Fridge Food
steps.content: My Fridge Food My Fridge Food turns your pantry items into a delicious meal. Simply input what you have in your fridge and pantry, and this site will create a recipe you can make without going to the store for more ingredients.

steps.title: Hubski
steps.content: Hubski Hubski is a forum hub for all things conversation. Find unique conversation starters and questions you can ask your friends. With the help of this site, you’ll never run out of things to talk about!

steps.title: OnRead
steps.content: OnRead OnRead offers hundreds of free books you can read right now! Simply browse through the titles and select whichever one interests you most.

steps.title: Word of the Day
steps.content: Word of the Day Word of the Day offers a new word every single day. Challenge yourself to use the day’s word at least once!

steps.title: Letters of Note
steps.content: Letters of Note Letters of Note is a hub for all things historical. Read through letters from former political figures, celebrities, and ordinary citizens.

steps.title: Atlas Obscura
steps.content: Atlas Obscura Atlas Obscura teaches you about the world’s hidden gems. This website is perfect for adventure seekers looking for a new destination.

steps.title: MapCrunch
steps.content: MapCrunch MapCrunch gives you a random Google map with the only objective to explore. Who knows? You may just find your next vacation spot!

steps.title: Snopes
steps.content: Snopes Snopes is a fact-checking news website. This website helps you decipher fact from fiction when it comes to fake news.

steps.title: Nice News
steps.content: Nice News Nice News is a website full of only positive vibes. The only news you’ll find on this site is kind and good.

steps.title: OCEARCH Shark Tracker
steps.content: OCEARCH Shark Tracker OCEARCH Shark Tracker lets you track sharks and turtles in real time. Learn where sharks and turtles are swimming right now by clicking the link.

steps.title: wikiHow
steps.content: wikiHow You know we have tons of interesting articles on wikiHow , so browse around the site to learn new skills, watch expert videos, comment on forums, take quizzes, and more! Looking for more tips on how to cure boredom? Check out our Boredom Busters page for more articles, activities, and quizzes!
